name: Modulation
description:
Modulation

~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~

Modulation is a rhythm based auto-scroller that has proven rather difficult in beta testing.

~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~

This game has 2 main controls during gameplay

Press X to perform your character's specific action (Jumping, Rising, or Shifting)

Press Z to activate slow motion, which will cause the game to run at 1/4 speed

~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~
